product_name: Blackburn Barrier Map and Tablet Case
long_description: The Blackburn Barrier Map and Tablet Case is touch-screen friendly, while clear windows and a pressure zip closure protect a tablet from moisture and road grime. Case is clear on both sides. 27.5cm x 19.5cm. Magnetic attachment works best with Blackburn Barrier Handlebar Bag (sold separately).
short_description: The Blackburn Barrier Map and Tablet Case is touch-screen friendly, while clear windows and a pressure zip closure protect a tablet from moisture and road grime.
